channel.title: pointing posts – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: Posts somewhat thin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Posts have been a bit thin lately and will be from me a few days more. I have run into being busy in a major way and am too tired to be conscientious, even though there is a lot going on. I hope to be back to a more regular schedule next week…even vacation posting […]
item.content:encoded: Posts have been a bit thin lately and will be from me a few days more.  I have run into being busy in a major way and am too tired to be conscientious, even though there is a lot going on.  I hope to be back to a more regular schedule next week…even vacation posting is easier than this.  Thanks for your patience.
